text: Sara Makovec (born 31 March 2000) is a Slovenian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Slovenia women's national team. ==Career== Makovec has been capped for the Slovenia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian women's footballers Category:Slovenia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:ŽNK Pomurje players
title: Sara Makovec
